description: Schema for submitting an expression or targeting vector stably or transiently transfected.
title: DNA construct

___genomic_integration_site.description: Genomic coordinates where construct is integrated, if known.
___genomic_integration_site.title: Integration site

___assembly.description: The genome assembly to which the target coordinates relate. e.g. GRCh38 or dm6
___assembly.title: Genome assembly

___chromosome.description: The number (or letter) designation for the target chromosome. e.g. 1, 2L, or X
___chromosome.title: Chromosome

___end.description: The ending coordinate (possibly equal to the starting coordinate for one base.)
___end.title: End

___promoter_position_relative_to_target.description: Relative distance of promoter sequence in the construct upstream of the target gene TSS.
___promoter_position_relative_to_target.comment: Distance in bp upstream of target gene TSS in the construct
___promoter_position_relative_to_target.title: Promoter position relative to target

___vector_backbone_name.description: The name of the vector backbone used for the construct.
___vector_backbone_name.title: Backbone name

items.comment: Submit tag name and tag location.
items.title: Protein tag

___promoter_genome_coordinates.description: Genomic coordinates of the promoter. Use NCBI assembly version:chromosome number:nucleotide range (e.g. WBcel235:III:1433720-1434340).
___promoter_genome_coordinates.title: Promoter genome coordinates

___assembly.description: The GRC genome assembly to which the target coordinates relate. e.g. GRCh38
___assembly.title: Genome assembly

___chromosome.description: The number (or letter) designation for the target chromosome. e.g. 1, 2L, or X
___chromosome.title: Chromosome

___end.description: The ending coordinate (possibly equal to the starting coordinate for one base.)
___end.title: End

___construct_type.description: The type of sequence expressed from the construct.
___construct_type.title: Type

elasticsearch_mapping_index_type.description: Defines one of three types of indexing available
elasticsearch_mapping_index_type.title: Field mapping index type

___description.description: A plain text description of the construct. May include backbone name, description of the insert or purpose of the construct.
___description.title: Description

___target.description: The name of the gene whose expression or product is modified by the construct.
___target.title: Target

___url.description: An external resource with additional information about the construct.
___url.title: URL

___promoter_used.description: The name of the gene that the promoter regulates natively.
___promoter_used.title: Promoter used in construct

___insert_sequence.description: DNA sequence inserted into the vector backbone.
___insert_sequence.title: Insert Sequence

___insert_genome_coordinates.description: Genomic coordinates of the insert. e.g. GRCh38 or dm6.
___insert_genome_coordinates.title: Insert genome coordinates

___assembly.description: The genome assembly to which the target coordinates relate. e.g. GRCh38
___assembly.title: Genome assembly

___chromosome.description: The number (or letter) designation for the target chromosome. e.g. 1, 2L, or X
___chromosome.title: Chromosome

___end.description: The ending coordinate (possibly equal to the starting coordinate for one base.)
___end.title: End
